CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 5, 1958, pg. 6 reads: "5. Chernoff Furniture Company representative, Herb Cohen, display the RCA-Victor record player, one of the big prizes."
TitMainTitle: Herb Cohen standing in Chernoff Furniture Company booth in Syria Mosque for the 1958 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
